articles.title: They escaped Ukraine's frontlines. The sound of drones followed them - BBC
articles.description: As technology transforms the war in Ukraine, soldiers are experiencing a new form of trauma: "Droneophobia".
articles.content:
Joel Gunter
Pavlo experienced drone warfare. "You are being hunted," he said.
In a cramped apartment in the Ukrainian capital Kyiv, Pavlo, a 30-year-old drone operator who had recently returned fro… [+8900 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop - Ars Technica
articles.description: Vaccination rates fell once again as nonmedical exemptions hit a new high.
